activities:
Therap Services, LLC. is a web-based service organization that provides an integrated solution for governmental, charitable and private organizations that provide assistance and support to people with disabilities, especially developmental disabilities.   More specifically, governments and organizations utilize Therap’s services and web-based facilities to document and track information on the individuals they support and care for, so they can more easily and efficiently satisfy their needs for documentation, reporting and communication with respect to such individuals.  Therap offers an efficient alternative to the immense amount of paperwork that would otherwise have to be done manually by these care provider agencies and organizations.

Therap’s suite of applications include Individual Support Documentation, Billing, Supported Employment and Management Solutions for governmental and private agencies. Therap is HIPAA, HITECH, and ARRA compliant, which ensures data integrity and security.
personaldata: Virtually all data from EU members is covered by the Safe Harbor Framework (please see above description of Therap’s activities and services).  Covered data does not include any manually processed data.         ]
